author: _shemnon
content: Quick followup on the proposed meeting for next week at the end of the call: most of Europe will be out for the next 4 days (Passover / Easter weekend) and so we will have at most 1 work day to iterate on proposals, so we will keep with the same 2 week schedule.  Later today I'll start two threads on the two unresolved discussion topics: EOF bootstrapping w/ to:nil and adding select opcodes outside the EOF container.
